name: Clin N Bone
title: Clinical N
notes:
**Note 1:**  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in distant metastasis.

**Note 2:**  Regional lymph nodes are defined as those in the vicinity of the primary tumor.

**Note 3:**  Regional lymph node involvement is rare.  If there is no mention of lymph node involvement clinically, assume that lymph nodes are negative.  Assign NX only when there is no available information on the extent of the patient's disease, for example when a lab-only case is abstracted from a biopsy report and no clinical history is available.
rows: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed

Clinical evaluation but unknown results or regional lymph node involvement not stated
Clinical evaluation done but results not documented in patient record

Regional lymph nodes, NOS
Lymph nodes, NOS

Stated as N1

Clinical N is not defined for the specific site/histology
In situ case but no pTis is defined by TNM

No clinical evaluation of regional lymph nodes
Cancer first detected on surgical resection
Unknown if any clinical assessment performed
